title: Don't Be Jealous
overview: It's no secret that it's extremely difficult for celebrities to openly be in a relationship in Korea. Don't Be Jealous looks to normalize this current taboo by talking about what life is like while dating under the limelight. These are the real love stories of Ji Sook, Chef Lee Won Il, and actress Choi Song Hyun - their private dating lives ready to be laid out. You can laugh and empathize with their honest love, their daily lives, and even their deepest thoughts! Hosted by Jang Sung Kyu, Jang Do Yun, Heo Jae, Ravi, and Jun So Mi, you'll surely be laughing as they narrate each relationship.
